other_tests.findings: Mild telecanthus and pigment mottling in the macula of both eyes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up examinations at 1 year and 2 years observed similar bilateral pigmentary changes in the macula.

other_tests.findings: Cycloplegic refraction: -3.50 + 4.50 × 095 in the right eye and -3.25 + 3.75 × 080 in the left eye.
Intraocular pressure was 14 mmHg in the right eye and 15 mmHg in the left eye.
Likely pathogenic 150 kilobase deletion of chromosome Xq28 containing 6 genes including FAM58A.
Outer retinal atrophy, disruption of the ellipsoid zone, yellow drusen-like deposits in the macula, and peripheral retinal pigment epithelial changes in both eyes.
Staining in areas of atrophy in both eyes.
